name: Oriental Big Ears Rabbit Cell Phone/Gadget Pouch
description:
Show your style and have some fun with this beautifully 90% hand-stitched and 10% machine embroidery pouch to protect your cell phone or favorite gadget. Great for you if you like to carry your cell phone, MP3 player or camera.

Designed to fit virtually all current standard iPhone 2G and 3G(1st & 2nd generation), iPodTouch, Nokia (N82,N73,E63,E71), Sony Ericsson 960i and any cell phones/gadgets which can fit within the inner measure pouch size of 12.3cm(H) x 7.5cm(W).

One-of-its-kind. The pattern of the above items are dependent on which portion of the fabric is being cut. You can't find the same piece. Made from new fabric, lined with polyester felt and decorated with a matching plastic button.

Note:
* Price-listed is for 1 phone pouch
* This item is not suitable for babies or young children. It consists of button.
* Combine shipping are welcome. I will adjust the postage rate before I confirm your purchase or you can send me a message.
* Screen resolution may differ slightly from actual product colours.
* Conversion: 1 cm = 0.3937" or 1" = 2.54cm

Your products are sent by Registered mail with tracking nos (Air-Mail Postage rate + Registered Article rate) through local mail provider(Singapore Post).

It is a lovely gift set for your love ones or just for yourself. .^_^.

Thanks for dropping by! :)
Materials utilised

cotton cloth, Acrylic felt, PLASTIC BUTTONS, Anna Sui Blusher
Production method

hand-stitched, machine sewn, hand-cut, original design
